articles.author: Clint Talbott
articles.title: Runoff, sediment flux in High Mountain Asia could limit food, energy for millions - Phys.org
articles.description: Rivers flowing from the Tibetan Plateau and the surrounding high Asian mountains which support one-third of the world's population have experienced rapid increases in annual water and sediment runoff since the 1990s, and the volume of sediment washed downstre…
articles.content: Rivers flowing from the Tibetan Plateau and the surrounding high Asian mountains which support one-third of the world's population have experienced rapid increases in annual water and sediment runoff… [+4390 chars]

articles.title: PH renews call for 'urgent' climate action, justice in regional summit - CNN Philippines
articles.description: The Philippines has renewed its call for 'urgent' climate justice and urged nations to take action on the matter during the 16th East Asia Summit held this week.
articles.content: Metro Manila (CNN Philippines, October 28) The Philippines has renewed its call for urgent climate justice and urged nations to take action on the matter during the 16th East Asia Summit held this we… [+862 chars]
